type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeBinarySpec
type.description: Represents a binary artifact that is the result of building a native component.

method.name: getObjcppCompiler
method.description: The configuration of the Objective-C++ compiler used when compiling Objective-C++ sources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'objective-cpp' plugin is applied.

method.name: getBuildType
method.description: Returns the org.gradle.nativeplatform.BuildType used to construct this binary.

method.name: getRcCompiler
method.description: The configuration of the Resource compiler used when compiling resources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'windows-resources' plugin is applied.

method.name: getTargetPlatform
method.description: Returns the org.gradle.nativeplatform.platform.NativePlatform that this binary is targeted to run on.

method.name: getStaticLibArchiver
method.description: The configuration of the static library archiver used when creating this binary. Valid for StaticLibraryBinarySpec.

method.name: getLibs
method.description: The libraries that should be linked into this binary.

method.name: lib
method.description:
Adds a library as input to this binary.

This method accepts the following types:

  • A NativeLibrarySpec
  • A NativeDependencySet
  • A java.util.Map containing the library selector.
The Map notation supports the following String attributes:
  • project: the path to the project containing the library (optional, defaults to current project)
  • library: the name of the library (required)
  • linkage: the library linkage required ['shared'/'static'] (optional, defaults to 'shared')

method.name: getObjcCompiler
method.description: The configuration of the Objective-C compiler used when compiling Objective-C sources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'objective-c' plugin is applied.

method.name: getComponent
method.description: The component that this binary was built from.

method.name: getCppCompiler
method.description: The configuration of the C++ compiler used when compiling C++ sources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'cpp' plugin is applied.

method.name: getcCompiler
method.description: The configuration of the C compiler used when compiling C sources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'c' plugin is applied.

method.name: getFlavor
method.description: The org.gradle.nativeplatform.Flavor that this binary was built with.

method.name: getLinker
method.description: The configuration of the linker used when linking this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description: Returns the org.gradle.nativeplatform.toolchain.NativeToolChain that will be used to build this binary.

method.name: getAssembler
method.description: The configuration of the assembler used when compiling assembly sources this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'assembler' plugin is applied.

property.name: assembler
property.description: The configuration of the assembler used when compiling assembly sources this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'assembler' plugin is applied.

property.name: linker
property.description: The configuration of the linker used when linking this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec.

property.name: targetPlatform
property.description: Returns the org.gradle.nativeplatform.platform.NativePlatform that this binary is targeted to run on.

property.name: toolChain
property.description: Returns the org.gradle.nativeplatform.toolchain.NativeToolChain that will be used to build this binary.

property.name: flavor
property.description: The org.gradle.nativeplatform.Flavor that this binary was built with.

property.name: objcCompiler
property.description: The configuration of the Objective-C compiler used when compiling Objective-C sources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'objective-c' plugin is applied.

property.name: component
property.description: The component that this binary was built from.

property.name: objcppCompiler
property.description: The configuration of the Objective-C++ compiler used when compiling Objective-C++ sources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'objective-cpp' plugin is applied.

property.name: libs
property.description: The libraries that should be linked into this binary.

property.name: cppCompiler
property.description: The configuration of the C++ compiler used when compiling C++ sources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'cpp' plugin is applied.

property.name: buildType
property.description: Returns the org.gradle.nativeplatform.BuildType used to construct this binary.

property.name: cCompiler
property.description: The configuration of the C compiler used when compiling C sources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'c' plugin is applied.

property.name: rcCompiler
property.description: The configuration of the Resource compiler used when compiling resources for this binary. Valid for SharedLibraryBinarySpec, StaticLibraryBinarySpec and NativeExecutableBinarySpec when the 'windows-resources' plugin is applied.

property.name: staticLibArchiver
property.description: The configuration of the static library archiver used when creating this binary. Valid for StaticLibraryBinarySpec.
